Package ohos.agp.components

Interface RadioContainer.CheckedStateChangedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    RadioContainer

    public static interface RadioContainer.CheckedStateChangedListener
    Provides callback methods to process change events of a radio button container.

    For example, you can use this interface to select another radio button in the radio container, or deselect all radio buttons in the container.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onCheckedChanged​(RadioContainer container, int checkedId)
      Callback to process change events of a radio button container.

    • Method Detail

      • onCheckedChanged

        void onCheckedChanged​(RadioContainer container,
                      int checkedId)
        Callback to process change events of a radio button container.

        When the state of a radio button in the group changes from deselected to selected or vice versa, the value of checkedId indicates the ID of the selected radio button. If all radio buttons are deselected, the value of checkedId is RadioContainer.INVALID_ID.

        Parameters:
        container - Indicates the radio button container where the state of a radio button changes.
        checkedId - Indicates the ID of the most recently selected radio button.
